â€œBetter ask the Captain about this town.
He's the one in charge of it.â€
{CHOICE}Captain?
{CHOICE}Did you see a man in a black cape?

â€œThe Captain was a pilot
when Shinra was still interested
in their Space Program.â€{PAUSE}â€œHe was going to be the world's
first astronaut,
but there was an accidentâ€¦â€{PAUSE}â€œEver since then, he's been wasting
his life away here dreaming about
going into outer space.â€

â€œA man in a black cape?
Nopeâ€¦never seen him.â€

â€œThis used to be a Shinra base
where they used to launch rockets.â€{PAUSE}â€œYou saw the leaning rocket, right?
That's Shinra No. 26.
It never got off the ground though.â€

â€œEveryone in this town was a mechanic
back when they were planning to
launch the rocket.â€

{Cloud}
â€œRocket launch plan?
What do you mean?â€

â€œYou don't know?â€{PAUSE}â€œThere was a plan to send a man
into outer space.â€{PAUSE}â€œIt was headed up by the leader of
the Shinra Space Program, Palmer.â€{PAUSE}â€œThis town is the result of the plan,
but the plan got cutâ€¦â€

{Cloud}
â€œWho's the 'Captain'?â€

{Cloud}
â€œDid you see a man in a black cape?â€

â€œDid you meet the Captain already?
He's really the town's representative,
so you should really talk with him.â€

â€œWelcome to the Shanghai Inn!â€{PAUSE}â€œIt's 100 gil a night.
Would you like to spend the night?â€
{CHOICE}Yes
{CHOICE}No
â€œYes sir. Thank you!â€
â€œWell then, come by again sometime.â€

â€œExcuse me.
Please don't come in here.â€{PAUSE}â€œOur books and the room keys are in here,
so I'll have to ask you to please stay out.â€

{Cloud}
â€œThe booksâ€¦â€{PAUSE}â€œMaybe we could find out who's been here?â€
{CHOICE}Was there a man in a black cape?
{CHOICE}Not interested

â€œLook, we're all adults here,
so I'd appreciate it
if you used some discretion.â€

â€œA man with a black cape?
No, no one like that
has ever stayed here.â€

â€œWould you like something to drink?â€
{CHOICE}Let me hear your story
{CHOICE}Not interested

â€œ{Cid}'s had some bad breaks.
It's really no one's fault
he couldn't go into space.â€{PAUSE}â€œJust bad luck, I guessâ€¦â€

â€œIf he keeps up like that,
he's gonna collapse someday.
Y'know what I mean?
I'm talkin' heart attack.â€

â€œâ€¦That's too bad.
Please come again.â€
â€œA drink will ease your heartâ€¦â€

â€œWelcome!
This is the Item Shop.â€

â€œâ€¦Hey now!
I would appreciate it
if you wouldn't come in.â€

{Cloud}
â€œWhat's that?â€

{Cloud}
â€œA rusty old rocketâ€¦
Wonder why they made
something so huge?â€

â€œThat rusted out rocket is
all that remains of
the Shinra's Space Program.â€

â€œIt just looms there.
That's how the town got its nameâ€¦
'Shinra No. 26'.â€{PAUSE}â€œWant to look at the rocket with me?â€
{CHOICE}Yeah, let's take a look
{CHOICE}No, not interested

â€œI get so impressed
every time I look at it.â€
â€œOh, how boringâ€¦â€

â€œAll gramps does is
gaze at that rocket all day long.â€

â€œWell, he really
loves machineryâ€¦â€
Locked

â€œExcuse meâ€¦
You don't have enough money.â€

â€œLet me handle
all your weapon and accessory needs!â€

â€œThere's a bunch of Shinra people
here messin' with the rocketâ€¦â€
â€œIs my rocketâ€¦all right?â€

â€œThe Shinra serious 'bout launching
that piece of crap rocket?
But why now?â€
â€œâ€¦I'm in here.â€
â€œUrrrrgh, urrrghâ€

â€œPâ€¦
Urrrrghâ€¦aaaaaghhâ€¦â€

â€œThere's a lot happenin'
in the world outside,
but as long as I got this rocket
I'm satisfied.â€

â€œAnyways.â€{PAUSE}â€œHow 'bout it?
Want to look at the rocket with me?â€
{CHOICE}Look up
{CHOICE}No

â€œMy, my precious rocketâ€¦
It's gone.â€

â€œHmph, I know.
No matter how much I look,
the rocket's still gone.â€{PAUSE}â€œBut I just can't stop it.
Just call it an old man's
folly if you will.â€

â€œWhat's young President Rufus
doing by getting
all those mechanics together?â€
â€œThose terrorists are here!â€

â€œDon't let them get any further!
Everyone, ATTACK---!â€

â€œIs something about to happen?
Oh, I'm getting excited.â€
â€œMmm, a SPECTACLE.â€

â€œUrrrgh, you're not going anywhere!"
Uh un, nowhere!â€

{Cid}
â€œGoddammit, what the hell do they think
they're gonna do to my rocket!?â€

{Cid}
â€œI'm outta here, {Cloud}!
I'm gonna kick those $^%$# Shinra
right out of my rocket!â€

{Cid}
â€œWait, {Cloud}!â€

{Cid}
â€œIf you're gonna kick those *#$% Shinra
out of my rocket,
then take me with you!â€

{Cid}
â€œALL RIGHT!
Let's show those &$!@& Shinra!â€

{Cid}
â€œ{Cloud}, what are you doin'!?
They're gonna launch the rocket!!â€

Rude
â€œYou again?â€

Rude
â€œWe will eliminate everyone who
gets in Shinra's way.â€

Rude
â€œâ€¦They got us.â€

Rude
â€œâ€¦Hmm.â€

â€œWhat?
You guys are terrorists?
Wow, that's kinda exciting!â€
â€œMmm, here comes some hard action!â€

â€œHmm.
Is it real or fake?â€

â€œMmmâ€¦
I'm starting to see it nowâ€¦â€

â€œSorry to get you into this.
For me, it's a kinda hobby.â€{PAUSE}â€œBut, out of appreciation,
let me give you this.â€

â€œI wish you'd
take care of it and use itâ€¦â€

â€œMaybe it's time for me to
get a new hobbyâ€¦â€

â€œOh, it's you?
I heard you and the Captain
really made a BANG!â€{PAUSE}â€œI also heard that Rufus was so pissed off
he went on a rampage and that
no one's been able to get near him!â€

â€œIf things go on like this,
then Meteor's just going to smash
right into us and kill us all, right?
â€¦I guess that's life?â€

â€œI get so restless with the rocket gone.
And now that we can see Meteor clearly,
â€¦I can't stand it.â€

â€œI heard Tiny Bronco brokeâ€¦â€{PAUSE}â€œThat sucks.
I was secretly eyeing that thing.
Broke, huh? What a drag.â€

â€œLook up at the sky.
The bigger Meteor gets,
the less time we have to live.â€

â€œI still can't believe that
piece of crap rocket
actually made it into spaceâ€¦
I guess the mechanic was a genius.â€

â€œBecause those Shinra creeps locked us
up in our houses, we couldn't
even watch the rocket lift off.â€{PAUSE}â€œI never thought that my only hobby
would be destroyed by that
arrogant young Rufus!â€

â€œMmm. You know that Shinra sports car
at {Cid}'s house?
It might be fun to try and restore
that thingâ€¦â€

â€œWelcome to the Shanghai Inn!
Only 300 gil a night?â€
{CHOICE}Yes
{CHOICE}No

â€œY'know, I heard Rufus rushed back
to headquarters in Midgarâ€¦â€

â€œEven though they failed to blow up
Meteor with the rocket,
the Shinra haven't given up yetâ€¦â€{PAUSE}â€œLooks like they're gathering all the weapons
from all their bases and
are preparing for a final showdown.â€

â€œI heard a rumor that a Shinra airship
carrying a secret weapon was attacked by
a monster and sunk to the bottom of the seaâ€¦â€

â€œYou don't feel comfortable here?
Then, everytime you look in the sky
you see Meteor.â€

â€œHow long's that guy gonna be
in the bathroom?
I need to go, tooâ€¦â€

â€œSeems like Palmer of Shinra, Inc.
ordered soldiers
to restore the rocketâ€¦â€

â€œMeteor's coming toward us!?
And I can't even go to the bathroomâ€¦!?â€

â€œOK, which is gonna happen first?
Meteor hits us,
or that guy comes out of the bathroom?â€{PAUSE}â€œI'm not movin' from this spot
till I see it with my own eyes.â€

â€œEven with all this goin' on outside,
that guy still won't come out
of the bathroom?
He must be a damn water tank!?â€

â€œIs Gramps gonna stay like that
even though rocket's gone?â€

â€œGeeeeez, it's boring!
Isn't anything exciting going to happen here?â€

â€œNow that one of Shinra's greatest events is over,
I guess it's back to
the same old boring life againâ€¦â€

â€œMmm, I'm so bored.
Isn't there anything that can excite me?â€
â€œEven the rocket launch wasn't all THAT great.â€

Shera
â€œI'll take care of everything at home.
But please take care of the Captain.â€

Shera

â€œNow all we have to take care of

{Cid}

my mistake.â€
â€œOh, 'crap-again'(oh, captain).â€

{Cid}
â€œSorry, 'bout that, now lesseâ€¦â€{PAUSE}â€œLooks like that *&%$#^$ Rufus wants to
